item.title: Vapor 4 with Tailwind CSS
item.description: Usually developers prefer to segregate backend and frontend. Several frameworks allow to develop frontend and backend together, Vapor is one of them (i.e. Ruby on Rails, Django, etc). Time to time heated debates start about the “best” method how to style your frontend. Whether writing CSS totally from scratch is the best or using CSS frameworks(i.e. Bootstrap, Foundation, Bulma). My favourite CSS framework is TailwindCSS, as I hardly do any web development, my CSS skills are very limited.
